requirements.description: A simple client-side web application for performing basic and scientific calculations, built using React.

features.name: Scientific Functions
features.description: Support for trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan), logarithmic functions (log, ln), exponential functions (e^x), square roots, powers (x^y), and parentheses for order of operations.

features.name: Input/Output Display
features.description: A clear display area for inputting expressions and showing results.

features.name: Clear and Reset Functionality
features.description: Buttons to clear the current entry and reset the entire calculator state.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Graceful handling and display of errors, such as division by zero or invalid expressions.

features.name: Responsive User Interface
features.description: The calculator interface should adapt and be fully functional across various screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile).

requirements.user_input: build a simple scientific calculator web app using react
